thread.title: Silicon Valley Ethos: Prestigious Japan School Ventures into Entrepreneurship
thread.title_full: Silicon Valley Ethos: Prestigious Japan School Ventures into Entrepreneurship - WSJ

author: Alexander Martin
title: Silicon Valley Ethos: Prestigious Japan School Ventures into Entrepreneurship
text:
TOKYO—The University of Tokyo, long considered a breeding ground for Japan’s political and business elite, is venturing into new terrain: entrepreneurship.
The nation’s most prestigious university, known as Todai, has produced more than a dozen prime ministers and most of the top officials at government ministries. But in recent years, the 138-year-old school has been working to shake its conservative image and bring some Silicon... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
